Nyakio Quinoa Depuffing Eye Cream (2020 formulation)

Brand: Nyakio

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: WATER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER***, GLYCERYL STEARATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE), COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, CHENOPODIUM QUINOA SEED EXTRACT, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE)

STEARATE CITRATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE), COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, CHENOPODIUM QUINOA SEED EXTRACT, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, ADANSONIA DIGITATA (BAOBAB) SEED OIL, PRUNUS ARMENIACA (APRICOT) KERNEL OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES,

PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, ADANSONIA DIGITATA (BAOBAB) SEED OIL, PRUNUS ARMENIACA (APRICOT) KERNEL OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, NIACINAMIDE, CAFFEINE, COFFEA ARABICA (COFFEE) EXTRACT, SOLANUM LYCOPERSICUM (TOMATO) FRUIT/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT

HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, NIACINAMIDE, CAFFEINE, COFFEA ARABICA (COFFEE) EXTRACT, SOLANUM LYCOPERSICUM (TOMATO) FRUIT/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL, ALLANTOIN, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA POD) POTASH,

EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL, ALLANTOIN, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA POD) POTASH, ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL, GLYCERYL UNDECYLENATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
